title:
ملحق بتعديل القرارات  المتعلقة باجازتي طيار تجاري وطيار خط
جوي والكفاءات  اللازمة لقائد الطائرة والطيار المساعد وكفاءة الطيران
بواسطة-
 الآلات  وتحديدها

articles.number:
1 
The applicant shall:
            الاهلية:
           ــــــــــ
1- "Demonstrate in a synthetic trainer before a pilot
examiner designated by the lebanese licensing authority
his competency in the use of at least two of the radio
aids used for navication and approach to land consisting
of the following:
Radio Range
N.D.B
V.O.R
I.l.S
Amend para 1- becomes para 2 and remains the same
Amend para 2- becomes para 3 and remains the same
Amend para 3- becomes para 4 and remains the same

content.data:
The applicant shall:
            الاهلية:
           ــــــــــ
1- "Demonstrate in a synthetic trainer before a pilot
examiner designated by the lebanese licensing authority
his competency in the use of at least two of the radio
aids used for navication and approach to land consisting
of the following:
Radio Range
N.D.B
V.O.R
I.l.S
Amend para 1- becomes para 2 and remains the same
Amend para 2- becomes para 3 and remains the same
Amend para 3- becomes para 4 and remains the same
